name: binance-asyncapi-go-template
description: A spec-driven template that generates Go WebSocket clients for Binance AsyncAPI v3 specifications.

scripts.generate: MODULE_NAME=${MODULE_NAME:-github.com/openxapi/binance-go/ws}; PACKAGE_NAME=${PACKAGE_NAME:-spot}; VERSION=${VERSION:-0.1.0}; AUTHOR=${AUTHOR:-openxapi}; SPEC_FILE=${SPEC_FILE:-../../../../specs/binance/asyncapi/spot.yaml}; OUTPUT_DIR=${OUTPUT_DIR:-./output}; ${ASYNCAPI_CLI:-asyncapi} generate fromTemplate "$SPEC_FILE" ./ --output "$OUTPUT_DIR" --force-write -p moduleName="$MODULE_NAME" -p packageName="$PACKAGE_NAME" -p version="$VERSION" -p author="$AUTHOR"
scripts.generate:module: MODULE=${MODULE:-spot}; SPEC_FILE=${SPEC_FILE:-../../../../specs/binance/asyncapi/$MODULE.yaml}; CFG=../../../../generator-configs/binance/asyncapi/go/$MODULE.json; if [ ! -f "$SPEC_FILE" ]; then echo "Spec not found for module '$MODULE' at $SPEC_FILE"; exit 1; fi; if [ -f "$CFG" ]; then MODULE_NAME=$(node -pe "JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('$CFG', 'utf8')).generator.parameters.moduleName.default"); PACKAGE_NAME=$(node -pe "JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('$CFG', 'utf8')).generator.parameters.packageName.default"); VERSION=$(node -pe "JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('$CFG', 'utf8')).generator.parameters.version.default"); AUTHOR=$(node -pe "JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('$CFG', 'utf8')).generator.parameters.author.default"); else MODULE_NAME=${MODULE_NAME:-github.com/openxapi/binance-go/ws}; PACKAGE_NAME=${PACKAGE_NAME:-$MODULE}; VERSION=${VERSION:-0.1.0}; AUTHOR=${AUTHOR:-openxapi}; fi; OUTPUT_DIR=${OUTPUT_DIR:-./output}; ${ASYNCAPI_CLI:-asyncapi} generate fromTemplate "$SPEC_FILE" ./ --output "$OUTPUT_DIR" --force-write -p moduleName="$MODULE_NAME" -p packageName="$PACKAGE_NAME" -p version="$VERSION" -p author="$AUTHOR"
scripts.test: npm run test:clean && npm run test:generate && npm run test:build
scripts.test:generate: MODULE_NAME=${MODULE_NAME:-github.com/openxapi/binance-go/ws}; PACKAGE_NAME=${PACKAGE_NAME:-spot}; VERSION=${VERSION:-0.1.0}; AUTHOR=${AUTHOR:-openxapi}; SPEC_FILE=${SPEC_FILE:-../../../../specs/binance/asyncapi/spot.yaml}; ${ASYNCAPI_CLI:-asyncapi} generate fromTemplate "$SPEC_FILE" ./ --output test/project --force-write -p moduleName="$MODULE_NAME" -p packageName="$PACKAGE_NAME" -p version="$VERSION" -p author="$AUTHOR"
scripts.test:build: cd test/project && MODULE_NAME=${MODULE_NAME:-github.com/openxapi/binance-go/ws}; go mod init generated >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; go mod edit -replace "$MODULE_NAME"=. && go mod tidy && go build -o client .
scripts.example: npm run test:generate && cd test/project && go run ./...

moduleName.description: The Go module name for the generated client.

packageName.description: The Go package name for the generated client.

version.description: The version of the generated client package.

author.description: The author of the generated client package.
